1.text: Wash your face with a gentle cleanser.

2.text: Dab 2 tablespoons (30 mL) of raw milk onto a cotton pad.
2.vid: /3/36/Apply Raw Milk on Your Face Step 2.360p.mp4

3.text: Rub the cotton pad on your face for 1 minute.
3.vid: /a/ab/Apply Raw Milk on Your Face Step 3.360p.mp4

4.text: Rinse your face with cool water.
4.vid: /6/6b/Apply Raw Milk on Your Face Step 4.360p.mp4

5.text: Apply the raw milk every day for best results.

6.text: Mix 3 tablespoons (44 mL) of milk with 1 US tbsp (15 mL) of honey.
6.vid: /3/3c/Apply Raw Milk on Your Face Step 6.360p.mp4

7.text: Massage the mixture into your skin for 5 minutes.

8.text: Let the mixture sit on your skin for another 5 minutes.

9.text: Rinse your skin with cold water.
9.vid: /9/99/Apply Raw Milk on Your Face Step 9.360p.mp4

10.text: Repeat this daily to remove dark spots and even out your skin tone.

11.text: Mix 4 tbsp (36 g) of turmeric and 5 tablespoons (74 mL) of raw milk.
11.vid: /b/be/Apply Raw Milk on Your Face Step 11.360p.mp4

12.text: Apply the mixture to your face with your fingers.
12.vid: /f/fb/Apply Raw Milk on Your Face Step 12.360p.mp4

13.text: Let the mixture sit for 25 minutes.

14.text: Rinse your skin with cold water.
14.vid: /b/b3/Apply Raw Milk on Your Face Step 14.360p.mp4

15.text: Repeat this 3 to 4 times a week until your skin is even.
